Custom algorithm

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078626026{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}»]

Use Machine Learning to solve a specific problem of your business.

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»large» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Accent-Color» solid_text_color_override=»#0a0a0a» icon_family=»none» url=»/contact» text=»I want more info» margin_top=»40″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» equal_height=»yes» content_placement=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_color=»#fbfbfb» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» top_padding=»2%» bottom_padding=»4%» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none» enable_animation=»true» animation=»fade-in-from-bottom» delay=»200″][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078726906{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}»]

Increase your sales, build customer loyalty, optimize processes or reduce costs using our machine learning algorithms.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We design, develop and deploy Machine Learning models to accelerate decision making.
[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»small» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Extra-Color-1″ solid_text_color_override=»#ffffff» icon_family=»none» url=»https://www.rockingdata.com.ar/como-lo-hacemos/» text=»How do we do it?» margin_top=»40″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» top_margin=»-10″ width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»center» phone_text_alignment=»center» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none» enable_animation=»true» animation=»grow-in» delay=»200″][image_with_animation image_url=»956″ alignment=»center» animation=»Fade In» hover_animation=»none» border_radius=»none» box_shadow=»none» image_loading=»default» max_width=»110%» max_width_mobile=»125%» el_class=»img-anim»][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_color=»#ededed» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» top_padding=»4%» bottom_padding=»4%» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

1) Model Design

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Definition of the business case.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078808743{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Analysis of the current situation of the process.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078814699{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Analysis of available data.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078821843{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Analysis of technological infrastructure.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078826970{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Pooling and design validation.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

2) Development

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Obtaining, cleaning and quality control of data.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078879856{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Enrichment with external data.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078886020{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Machine Learning model training and selection of the optimal model.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

3) Deployment

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Model automation to make predictions and re-training on demand.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651078915177{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Deployment of predictions via api and / or dashboards.
